long_description: designed amidst raw nature, green surroundings and sprawling landscape, forest hill resort is a haven of tranquility. just 15 minutes away from chandigarh, this place is a warm welcoming hug that embraces you with its serene and tranquil environment. known for its distinctive beauty and simplicity, forest hill resort is a destination surrounded by ample flora and fauna. the stunning countryside charm and sweeping views of the shivalik hills bring together nature lovers from all around. its strategic location gives you the peace that you are looking for but at the same time keeps you connected to the city beautiful – chandigarh, chandigarh airport and region’s other exciting arcades.

locations: in, india, punjab, sahibzada ajit singh nagar, 160103, , , 30.775049260000003, 76.79966132999999
short_description: forest hill resort is a golf courses & country club based in sahibzada ajit singh nagar, india.
long_description: forest hill golf and country club is a unique concept in sports, leisure and recreation, conceived on an unprecedented scale of magnificence. forest hill resort is a perfect blend of hundreds of acres of verdant beauty and finesse. the golf course is an eco-friendly destination that has retained the original beauty of the terrain while enhancing it with fresh plantation. the rich hybrid bermuda fairways and tiff dwarf greens along with the shimmering azure blue of the strategically placed lakes enhance the uncontrived style of this magnificent course. hundred feet elevations that gracefully roll along well placed water hazards and expensive sand bunkers with two hilltop holes, offer an unparallel panorama of shivalik hill skyline. forest hill golf and country club members shall enjoy host of privileges at the 5-star facilities that are on the anvil in the near future. the most challenging golf course according to the professionals, the forest hill golf course is one of the most challenging course and would give a stimuli to the game. the 9-holes, 3578 yards, par-36 golf course is a perfect blend of strategy, dynamism of power, finesse and fun. with tight well-bunkered greens of varying sizes and intricate contouring placed on the sometimes meandering, undulating and tricky landscape, each fairway is on a different plane with the natural hurdles of gorges, beautiful lakes and sand bunkers. this championship course offers exciting options for the golfers. according to a leading professional, "if you can, play the course twice. the first time around is likely to be blur, akin to taking a ride on a roller coaster. you're too scared to enjoy the ride. the second time you can catch your breath and appreciate the shot values in some of the holes!!"at fhr, it is ensured that the championship golf course has been maintained to let you enliven unmatched golfing experience. golf academy and range

generated_description: forest hill golf and country club is a unique concept in sports, leisure, and recreation located in the forest hill resort. the club offers an eco-friendly golf course that combines the original beauty of the terrain with fresh plantation. the course features hybrid bermuda fairways, tiff dwarf greens, strategically placed lakes, and well-placed water hazards and sand bunkers. with two hilltop holes and hundreds of feet elevations, the course offers a panoramic view of the shivalik hill skyline. forest hill golf club provides members with privileges at 5-star facilities in the near future. the championship 9-hole, 3578 yards, par-36 course offers exciting options for golfers and is considered one of the most challenging courses according to professionals. the golf course is known for its strategy, power, finesse, and fun, with tight, well-bunkered greens and intricate contouring. the facility also includes a golf academy and range.
